article.title: Irradiation study of UV Silicon Photomultipliers for the Mu2e Calorimeter

multiple_choice_question.text: What is the typical shape of the layout of the Superconducting Solenoid Magnet System in the Mu2e experiment?
What type of coating is NOT shown in the PDE graph for different models of Hamamatsu SiPMs?
How does the signal width of a series of three 6x6 mm² SiPMs compare to that of a single 6x6 mm² SiPM?
choices: The signal width is wider for the series.
The signal width is the same for both.
The signal width is narrower for the series.
The comparison cannot be determined from the figure.

multiple_choice_question.text: What is the approximate activity of the 60Co source used in the dose irradiation tests conducted at the ENEA CALLIOPE facility?
